metadata.title: Wednesday,5th October, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to provide water to the following areas in Isoka Parliamentary Constituency:
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) if there are no such plans, why; and
(d) whether the Government has any plans to sink boreholes in the areas at (a).

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when construction of Mvuvye Bridge in Chieftainess Mwape’s chiefdom in Nyimba District will commence;
(b) what the name of the contractor is; and
(c) what the cost of the project is. 56.  MrSimuzingili (Gwembe)  -  to askthe Minister of Justice:
(a) when the Government will procure furniture for Chipepo Local Court in Gwembe District;
(b) what the cost of the furniture is; and

(c) when the Local Court will be opened to the public. NOTICE OF MOTION Mr Munir Zulu Abolish Position of District Commissioner: That this House urges the Government to abolish the position of District Commissioner. ORDER OF THE DAY 1.
